content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column]

We Are The Best In The
Business

[vc_empty_space alter_height=”small” hide_on_desktop=”” hide_on_notebook=”” hide_on_tablet=”” hide_on_mobile=”” css=”.vc_custom_1509007869940{margin-top: 0.3rem !important;}”][vc_column_text]We’re your dedicated tech support team, ready to set up and fix your mobile, tablet or laptop.  In most cases, technicians will be able to repair your device in just minutes, we’ll normally get your phone in and out in 45 minutes or less. At TechFix we are here to service as quickly and conveniently as possible. We are experts at what we do.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space alter_height=”small” hide_on_desktop=”” hide_on_notebook=”” hide_on_tablet=”” hide_on_mobile=”” css=”.vc_custom_1509007897794{margin-top: 0.6rem !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”276″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space alter_height=”huge” hide_on_desktop=”” hide_on_notebook=”” hide_on_tablet=”” hide_on_mobile=”” css=”.vc_custom_1509008133756{margin-top: -0.2rem !important;}”]

What Problems Can TechFix
Repair?

[vc_empty_space alter_height=”small” hide_on_desktop=”” hide_on_notebook=”” hide_on_tablet=”” hide_on_mobile=””]
Cracked Screen
Problems

Cracked screen replacement services are both fast and affordable.

Read More
Water Damage
Problems

We will perform a diagnostic to determine the extent of the damage.

Read More
Speaker Not Working
Problems

You may be in need of a speaker repair or replacement.

Read More
No Signal
Problems

When you are experiencing weak signal or no signal.

Read More
Broken Buttons
Problems

If buttons on your device are malfunctioning or broken.

Read More
Dead Battery
Problems

FixTeam performs professional battery replacements.

Read More
[vc_empty_space alter_height=”medium” hide_on_desktop=”” hide_on_notebook=”” hide_on_tablet=”” hide_on_mobile=”” css=”.vc_custom_1509008457332{margin-top: 1.9rem !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1501675065327{background-image: url(http://thetechfixers.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/img_3.jpg?id=282) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" icons_position="left"][vc_empty_space alter_height="huge" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile=""]

Our Repairs Mean Business.

[vc_empty_space alter_height="small" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile="" css=".vc_custom_1509009269366{margin-top: 0.4rem !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1571240922487{padding-right: 4rem !important;}"]Broken and slow-performing devices can grind productivity down to a halt for big and small companies. Techfix can get business booming again.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space alter_height="small" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile="" css=".vc_custom_1509009328296{margin-top: 0.75rem !important;}"]Contact Us[vc_empty_space alter_height="huge" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile="" css=".vc_custom_1509009355105{margin-top: 0.5rem !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
[vc_row][vc_column icons_position="left"][vc_empty_space alter_height="huge" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile="" css=".vc_custom_1508317547308{margin-top: -0.2rem !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
